channel.title: How could I make it where you need an item to go through a portal or door
channel.description: Like, I want to make it where you have to have a anti-dragonshield to go to kbd, how would I go about making that?

item.title: How could I make it where you need an item to go through a portal or door
item.dc:creator: @Oh_Hai Oh Hai
item.description:
@Oh_Hai wrote:

if((playerHasItem(%item ID%, %item amount%) == true){ teleportToX = %X coords%; teleportToY = %Y coords%; } else { sendMessage("Sorry you do not have the item required."); }

Something like that.

Read full topic
item.source: How could I make it where you need an item to go through a portal or door
